Job Description

Job Description:

  • Develop and maintain relationships with suppliers, negotiating contracts and prices.
  • Analyze market trends and customer needs to inform purchasing decisions.
  • Manage inventory levels to ensure product availability and timely delivery.
  • Work closely with the marketing and sales teams to understand customer preferences and demand.
  • Stay informed about industry developments, new product offerings, and supplier capabilities.
  • Coordinate logistics activities to ensure transparent and timely receipt of goods.
  • Maintain update purchasing and logistics records up to date.
  • Other Purchasing and Logistics related tasks will be assigned.

Qualifications:

  • Have strong work ethic and be punctual.
  • Good level of organizational skills.
  • Be detailed and task oriented.
  • Can multi-task and work quickly to meet deadlines on a daily basis.
  • Good interpersonal communication skills and positive attitude.
  • Must be bilingual in English and Korean.
  • Proficiency in Excel.
  • Prior experience handling logistics, a plus.
  • Prior experience with ERP, demand forecasting, and/or TMS, a plus.
  • Prior experience in purchasing in fashion-related industry, a plus.

Company Description

We are a well-respected, leading brand in the international hair & beauty industry, providing our customers with high quality hair solutions in both classic and the most current styles. We are looking for dedicated and talented individuals to come on board to work with us in this exciting and dynamic environment.
